newsitem.title: FRANCE: Arianespace Finance obtains $400 mln credit line. [CORRECTED 17:50 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Arianespace Finance obtains $400 mln credit line. [CORRECTED 17:50 GMT]

text.p: Arianespace Finance Co, a wholly owned unit of Arianespace, has obtained a $400 million credit line arranged by four banks, one of the banks, Credit Lyonnais, said on Monday.

Credit Lyonnais said ING Lease, KFW and Societe Generale were the other three banks which signed an agreement with Arianespace, the European satellite launch company. It said in a statement the credit line will be syndicated among some 15 banks.
(Corrects to make clear banking syndicate not finalised).
